title: Ticket #3708: Do upgrade test before new stable series
description:
I think that maybe we should do an upgrade test from the previous stable series before the first release of any new stable series. (This issue arose because of the problem with upgrading from 7.8 to 8.0.0 with running DAGs that has bitten LIGO.)

I guess we should probably have realized that the DAG upgrade would be a problem, but in general I think we need a more systematic way of finding out this kind of thing before our users do...

Anyhow, I'm saying that maybe doing such a test should be part of the standard procedure before any new stable series (along with running on the pool for 3 weeks, etc.).
